tasks.check: deno check src/codefactory/mod.ts && deno check src/mcp-server/server.ts && deno check src/cli/main.ts
tasks.publish:check: cd src/codefactory && deno publish --dry-run && cd ../mcp-server && deno publish --dry-run && cd ../cli && deno publish --dry-run
tasks.build:cli: deno compile --include src/cli/templates --include src/mcp-server --include src/codefactory/factories --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --output=dist/codefactory src/cli/main.ts
tasks.build:extension: bash -c 'cd src/vscode-extension && npm install && npm run compile'
tasks.build:all: deno task build:cli && deno task build:extension
tasks.package:extension: bash -c 'cd src/vscode-extension && rm -f codefactory-0.1.1.vsix && vsce package --allow-missing-repository'
tasks.reload:extension: deno task build:extension && deno task package:extension && deno task install:extension-vsix && echo '✅ Extension rebuilt and installed. Press Ctrl+Shift+P → Developer: Reload Window'
tasks.install:local: deno task build:cli && mkdir -p ~/bin && cp dist/codefactory.exe ~/bin/codefactory.exe && echo 'Add ~/bin to PATH if not already there'
tasks.install:extension: bash -c 'deno task build:extension && rm -rf ~/.vscode/extensions/codefactory && ln -sf /c/Users/Atzu/Code/codefactory/src/vscode-extension ~/.vscode/extensions/codefactory && echo "✅ Extension installed. Reload VS Code to activate."'
tasks.install:all: deno task install:local && deno task install:extension
